document_data.mainbody:
Moqtafi was an undead architect inhabiting the ruined city of Ysawis in the Grey Jungle of east Zakhara in 1367 DR.
The undead servant was alive during the time of Princess Zoraya.
Moqtafi was tasked by the necromancer Sumulael with constructing his morbid Bone Pavilion in the Kings Garden of the Jade Palace of the Necromancers. Though his mind and memory were corrupted over the centuries, Moqtafi had intimate knowledge about the construction of the Jade Palace.
